full_summary:
# Air Medevac Services
### Solicitation Information

**Reference Number**: WS4224915999
**Solicitation Number**: WS4224915999
**Amendment Number**: 3
**Publication Date**: 2023-10-25
**Tender Closing Date**: 2023-12-05T14:00:00 EST

### Tender Summary
The [Public Works and Government Services Canada](https://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/) on behalf of [Indigenous Services Canada](https://www.sac-isc.gc.ca/) is soliciting proposals for the provision of air medevac services to serve the medical evacuation needs of Northern Saskatchewan. This service will include the provision of aircraft and crew fit-up to support air medevac services. The contracts are expected to commence on April 1, 2024, and terminate on March 31, 2027.

### Tender Information

* **Procurement Category**: Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: None
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating for Technical Merit and Price
* **Phased Bid Compliance Process**: Applicable

### Service Requirements
The service will undertake air medevac operations in Northern Saskatchewan. This service will include the provision of aircraft, medical personnel, and ground ambulance services. 

### Contact and Getting Help

* **Contact Person**: Kaiser, Erin
* **Contact Email**: erin.kaiser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Optional Bidder's Conference**: Available

### Attachments
No attachments are available.

### About This Tender
Please be advised that the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and CanadaBuys posting closing time are modified. Bids must be submitted by December 5, 2023, at 14:00 EST. The Federal Contractors Program for Employment Equity applies to this procurement.

### Notes
This tender is released under the [Language Rights Policy of Service Canada](https://www.canada.ca/en/employment-social-development/programs/official-languages/suggestions.html) and the [Office of the Commissioner of Official Languages Act](https://laws-lois.justice.gc.ca/eng/acts/C-31.3/page-28.html#h-27). Please review this policy to ensure your bid is compliant. [Public Works and Government Services Canada's website](https://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/) has more information on this obligation.
